column4: So, anyway to use IE in windows? I do web design and often my sites look good in firefox and chrome and safari but when they are loaded in IE the a**backwards program kills the page.
pages look different in IE and in deferent versions in ie as well IE is developer hell :D
yeah, no kidding. I want to through a rock at a IE engineer right now.
My sis is a pro developer for watson whyatt and she spends most of her time fixing her code to work wiwth old and new versions of IE
